history.proof: unfold Inv, cn_PhaseOneReceive. intros. destruct H. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: destruct H as [round [lg [H1 | [next_data H2]]]]; exists lg.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
r: nat
C: coh d
next_data: data
recvd: seq (nid * bool)

Goal:
Inv d -> getStC C = (r, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) -> exists lg : Log, cn_PhaseOneReceive d r next_data lg recvd

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
data = seq nid : Set
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
nid = nat : Set
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
Inv = fun d : dstatelet => exists (round : nat) (l : Log), [\/ EverythingInit d round l, exists next_data : data, PhaseOne d round next_data l | exists next_data : data, PhaseTwo d round next_data l] : dstatelet -> Prop
Notation seq := list
getStC : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> CStateT
Inductive CState : Set := CInit : CState | CSentPrep : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitPrepResponse : data -> seq (nid * bool) -> CState | CSentCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CSentAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState Arguments CSentPrep _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitPrepResponse _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentAbort _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckAbort _ _%seq_scope
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
cn_PhaseOneReceive = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) => let rps := [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] in [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd) l, uniq rps, {subset rps <= pts}, forall (pt : nat_eqType) (b : bool_eqType), pt \in pts -> (pt, b) \in recvd -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt \notin rps -> pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq (nid * bool) -> Prop Arguments cn
inv_init : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (C : coh d), Inv d -> getStC C = (e, CInit) -> exists lg : Log, EverythingInit d e lg
inv_prep_send : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (ps : seq nid) (C : coh d), Inv d -> getStC C = (e, CSentPrep dt ps) -> exists (lg : Log) (sent : seq nid), cn_PhaseOneSend d e dt lg sent
mapP : reflect (exists2 x : ?T1, x \in ?s & ?y = ?f x) (?y \in [seq ?f i | i <- ?s]) where ?T1 : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- eqType] ?T2 : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- eqType] ?f : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid *...
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- Type] ?P : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- ?A -> Type]
PhaseOne = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) => (exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseOneSend d round next_data l sent) \/ (exists recvd : seq (nid * bool), cn_PhaseOneReceive d round next_data l recvd) : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseOne _ _%nat_scope
Deprecation.hide : forall u : unit -> unit -> unit, Deprecation.exposed ?T u -> Deprecation.hidden ?T where ?T : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- Type]
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] d : dstatelet r : nat C : coh d next_data : data recvd : seq (nid * bool) |- Type]
PhaseTwo = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) => [\/ exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits d round next_data l sent, exists sent : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts d round next_data l sent, exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits d round next_data l recvd | exists recvd : seq nid, cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts d round next_data l recvd] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> Prop Arguments PhaseTwo _ _%nat_scope
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckCommit next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l true pt else pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (recvd : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CWaitAckAbort next_data recvd) l, uniq recvd, {subset recvd <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in recvd then pt_PhaseTwoResponded d round next_data l false pt else pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoReceiveAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentAbort next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoAbort d round next_data l pt else exists b : bool, pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l b pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendAborts _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
getStC_K : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), loc cn d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStC C = m
send_commit_prec = fun (pts : seq nid) (p : CStateT) (to : nat_eqType) (m : payload) => (exists (n : nat) (d : data) (res : seq (nid * bool)), [/\ p = (n, CWaitPrepResponse d res), m = [:: n], perm_eq [seq i.1 | i <- res] pts & all id [seq i.2 | i <- res]]) \/ (exists (n : nat) (d : data) (ps : seq nid), [/\ p = (n, CSentCommit d ps), m = [:: n] & to \notin ps]) : seq nid -> CStateT -> nat_eqType -> payload -> Prop Arguments send_commit_prec _%seq_scope
send_abort_prec = fun (pts : seq nid) (p : CStateT) (to : nat_eqType) (m : payload) => (exists (n : nat) (d : data) (res : seq (nid * bool)), [/\ p = (n, CWaitPrepResponse d res), m = [:: n], perm_eq [seq i.1 | i <- res] pts & has [eta negb] [seq i.2 | i <- res]]) \/ (exists (n : nat) (d : data) (ps : seq nid), [/\ p = (n, CSentAbort d ps), m = [:: n] & to \notin ps]) : seq nid -> CStateT -> nat_eqType -> payload -> Prop Arguments send_abort_prec _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentCommit next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data l pt else pt_PhaseOneResponded d round next_data l true pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseTwoSendCommits _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
cn_PhaseOneSend = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (sent : seq nid) => [/\ cn_state d (round, CSentPrep next_data sent) l, uniq sent, {subset sent <= pts} & forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> if pt \in sent then pt_PhaseOne d round next_data l pt else pt_Init d round l pt] : dstatelet -> nat -> data -> Log -> seq nid -> Prop Arguments cn_PhaseOneSend _ _%nat_scope _ _ _%seq_scope
locCn : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> valid (loc n d) /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (loc n d))
CState_ind : forall P : CState -> Prop, P CInit -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentPrep d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq (nid * bool)), P (CWaitPrepResponse d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentAbort d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckAbort d l)) -> forall c : CState, P c
CState_rect : forall P : CState -> Type, P CInit -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentPrep d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq (nid * bool)), P (CWaitPrepResponse d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentAbort d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckAbort d l)) -> forall c : CState, P c
CState_rec : forall P : CState -> Set, P CInit -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentPrep d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq (nid * bool)), P (CWaitPrepResponse d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentAbort d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckAbort d l)) -> forall c : CState, P c
CState_sind : forall P : CState -> SProp, P CInit -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentPrep d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq (nid * bool)), P (CWaitPrepResponse d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CSentAbort d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckCommit d l)) -> (forall (d : data) (l : seq nid), P (CWaitAckAbort d l)) -> forall c : CState, P c
cn_msg_wf : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> nid -> nid -> simpl_pred TaggedMessage
Inductive CState : Set := CInit : CState | CSentPrep : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitPrepResponse : data -> seq (nid * bool) -> CState | CSentCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CSentAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckCommit : data -> seq nid -> CState | CWaitAckAbort : data -> seq nid -> CState Arguments CSentPrep _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitPrepResponse _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CSentAbort _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckCommit _ _%seq_scope Arguments CWaitAckAbort _ _%seq_scope
cohStC : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> forall s : dynamic id, find st (loc cn d) = Some s -> dyn_tp s = CStateT
localCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (n : nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom h)] : nid -> seq nid -> nid -> Pred heap Arguments localCoh _ _%seq_scope
has_some_false : forall (xs : seq (nid * bool)) (ps : seq nat_eqType) (x : nat_eqType), perm_eq [seq i.1 | i <- xs] ps -> x \in ps -> exists b : bool_eqType, (x, b) \in xs
cstep_recv = fun (pts : seq nid) (cs : CStateT) (from : nid) (mtag : ttag) (mbody : payload) (l : Log) => if from \notin pts then (cs, l) else let '(e, _) := cs in if head 0 mbody != e then (cs, l) else cstep_recv' pts cs from mtag mbody l : seq nid -> CStateT -> nid -> ttag -> payload -> Log -> CStateT * Log Arguments cstep_recv _%seq_scope
getStL_Kc : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet) (C : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (pf : n \in nodes cn pts others) (m : CStateT) (l : Log), loc n d = st : -> m \+ log : -> l -> getStL C pf = l
cn_safe_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), cn_safe cn pts others prec this to d m -> TPCCoh cn pts others d
msg_wf : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.receive_trans coh -> forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> nid -> nid -> TaggedMessage -> bool
Exports.getStCE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (l : Label) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)), loc cn (getStatelet j l) = loc cn (getStatelet i l) -> getStC pf' = getStC pf
getStCE : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (l : Label) (i j : state) (pf : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet i l)) (pf' : TPCCoh cn pts others (getStatelet j l)), loc cn (getStatelet j l) = loc cn (getStatelet i l) -> getStC pf' = getStC pf
getStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (n : nat_eqType) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> n \in nodes cn pts others -> Log
cn_step : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), cn_safe cn pts others prec this to d msg -> option (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
soupCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) => Pred_of_Simpl [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find m s = Some ms -> exists y : nat, cohMsg cn pts ms y)] : nid -> seq nid -> Pred soup Arguments soupCoh _ _%seq_scope
send_prep_prec = fun (p : CStateT) (to : nat_eqType) (m : payload) => (exists n : nat, p = (n, CInit) /\ (exists d : seq nat, m = n :: d)) \/ (exists (n : nat) (d : data) (ps : seq nid), [/\ p = (n, CSentPrep d ps), m = n :: d & to \notin ps]) : CStateT -> nat_eqType -> payload -> Prop
cohStL : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCCoh cn pts others d -> forall n : nat_eqType, n \in nodes cn pts others -> forall l : dynamic id, find log (loc n d) = Some l -> dyn_tp l = Log
nodes = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) => [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> seq nid Arguments nodes _ (_ _)%seq_scope
cn_safe = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (prec : CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop) (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : data) => HCn cn pts this n /\ (exists C : TPCCoh cn pts others d, prec (getStC C) n msg) : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> (CStateT -> nid -> payload -> Prop) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> data -> Prop Arguments cn_safe _ (_ _)%seq_scope _%function_scope

```simpl.
unfold Inv, cn_PhaseOneReceive.

intros. destruct H as [round [lg [H1 | [next_data H2]]]]; exists lg.
- unfold EverythingInit in H1. unfold cn_state in H1. intuition.
- destruct H2 as [H2 | H2]; unfold PhaseOne in H2.
  + destruct H2 as [sent H2]. unfold cn_PhaseOneSend in H2. intuition.
  + destruct H2 as [recvd H2]. unfold cn_PhaseOneReceive in H2. intuition.
```

original: simpl. unfold Inv, cn_PhaseOneReceive. intros. destruct H as [round [lg [H1 | [next_data H2]]]]; exists lg. - unfold EverythingInit in H1. unfold cn_state in H1. intuition. - destruct H2 as [H2 | H2]; unfold PhaseOne in H2. + destruct H2 as [sent H2]. unfold cn_PhaseOneSend in H2. intuition. + destruct H2 as [recvd H2]. unfold cn_PhaseOneReceive in H2. intuition.
